abstract: Stocks fall overall, despite gains in oil and finance.

headline.print_headline: Oil Soars, Bonds Tumble, and Shares Mostly Slip
headline.main: Wall Street Ends Mixed as Oil Prices Soar

snippet: OPEC reached a deal to cut crude production, sending energy stocks and the price of oil higher, though the broader market retreated....
lead_paragraph: OPEC reached a deal to cut crude production, sending energy stocks and the price of oil higher, though the broader market retreated.
